revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: An account of the life and writings of Herman Boerhaave, doctor of philosophy and medicine; professor of the theory, and practice of physic; and also of botany and..."
revision.text: Possibly: An account of the life and writings of Herman Boerhaave, doctor of philosophy and medicine; professor of the theory, and practice of physic; and also of botany and chemistry in the University of Leyden; president of the Chirurgical College in that city; fellow of the Royal Society in London, and of the Royal Academy at Paris. : In two parts, with an appendix. / By Wm. Burton, M.D. (William Burton). 2nd ed. (London: : Printed for Henry Lintot, M. DCC. XLVI. [1746]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2172435~S1
